metadata.title: CVE-2024-29038 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: tpm2-tools is the source repository for the Trusted Platform Module(TPM2.0) tools. A malicious attacker can generate arbitrary quote datawhich is not detected by `tpm2 checkquote`. This issue was patched inversion 5.7.

criterions.comment: tpm2-tools package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
